title: Should I Give Up On My Best Friend?
itunes:title: Should I Give Up On My Best Friend?
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been best friends with someone for 18 years. This relationship was strictly platonic for this period, until I finally gave in year 19 to become more than just friends. After two years of this, I realize....

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
